verses.verse: Now those that <S%H2856>sealed<s%> were, <S%H5166>Nehemiah,<s%> the <S%H8660>Tirshatha,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hachaliah,<s%> and <S%H6667>Zidkijah,<s%>
And the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> both <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H245>Azaniah,<s%> <S%H1131>Binnui<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad,<s%> <S%H6934>Kadmiel;<s%>

And the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> the <S%H5411>Nethinims,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> they that had <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%> to the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> their <S%H802>wives,<s%> their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one having <S%H3045>knowledge,<s%> and having <S%H995>understanding;<s%>

They <S%H2388>joined<s%> to their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> their <S%H117>nobles,<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> into a <S%H423>curse,<s%> and into an <S%H7621>oath,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H430>God's<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H113>Lord,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes;<s%>

And that we would not <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for our <S%H1121>sons:<s%>

And if the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H4728>ware<s%> or any <S%H7668>victuals<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H4376>sell,<s%> that we would not <S%H3947>buy<s%> it of them on the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> or on the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and that we would <S%H5203>leave<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and the <S%H4855>exaction<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3027>debt.<s%>

Also we <S%H5975>made<s%> <S%H4687>ordinances<s%> for us, to <S%H5414>charge<s%> ourselves <S%H8141>yearly<s%> with the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%>

For the show <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H4635><s%> and for the <S%H8548>continual<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and for the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, of the <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> of the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons,<s%> for the <S%H4150>set<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> and for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, and for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offerings to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

And we <S%H5307>cast<s%> the <S%H1486>lots<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> for the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H7133>offering,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> it into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> after the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> at <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H2163>appointed<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year,<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law:<s%>

And to <S%H935>bring<s%> the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of our <S%H127>ground,<s%> and the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

Also the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of our <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and of our <S%H929>cattle,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of our <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of our <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God:<s%>

And that we should <S%H935>bring<s%> the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of our <S%H6182>dough,<s%> and our <S%H8641>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H6086>trees,<s%> of <S%H8492>wine<s%> and of <S%H3323>oil,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> to the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of our <S%H127>ground<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> that the <S%H1992>same<s%> <S%H3881>Levites<s%> might have the <S%H6237>tithes<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of our <S%H5656>tillage.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be with the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> when the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> take <S%H6237>tithes:<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> to the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> into the <S%H214>treasure<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1715>corn,<s%> of the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> to the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> are the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8334>minister,<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers:<s%> and we will not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>
